Warm-up (2-3 min)

Review all 8 vocabulary words:

support → ?     help → ?
avoid → ?       sick → ?
healthy → ?     married → ?
work → ?        wait → ?

(Answers: sarji, sidju, rivbi, bilma, kanro, speni, gunka, denpa)

New Material (5-7 min)

What Are Discursives?

Discursives are metalinguistic comments — they comment on your own text, not the content itself.

Key Discursives

Cmavo Meaning Use
ku'i however/but Contrast
ji'a also/additionally Addition
po'o only/just Restriction

Using ku'i (However)

mi klama .i ku'i do stali

I go. However, you stay.

ri melbi .i ku'i ri xlali

It's beautiful. However, it's bad.

Using ji'a (Also)

mi ji'a nelci lo plise

I also like apples.

la .alis. cu klama .i la .bob. ji'a klama

Alice goes. Bob also goes.

Using po'o (Only)

mi po'o klama

Only I go. / I only go.

lo plise po'o cu xamgu

Only apples are good.

Placement

Discursives can appear in various positions:

ku'i mi klama    = However, I go.
mi ku'i klama    = I, however, go.
mi klama ku'i    = I go, however.

Key Point

Discursives comment on your text. They don't change the logical meaning, but add nuance.
sections.title: New Material (5-7 min)

sections.content:
Practice (4-5 min)

Exercise 1: Use ku'i

Translate:

  1. I want to go. However, I must stay.
  2. It's good. However, it's expensive.
  3. I like it. However, I don't need it.
Answers
  1. mi djica lo nu klama .i ku'i mi bilga lo nu stali
  2. ri xamgu .i ku'i ri kargu
  3. mi nelci ri .i ku'i mi na nitcu ri

Exercise 2: Use ji'a

Translate:

  1. I also like dogs.
  2. Alice also works.
  3. Bob also goes.
Answers
  1. mi ji'a nelci lo gerku
  2. la .alis. ji'a gunka
  3. la .bob. ji'a klama

Exercise 3: Use po'o

Translate:

  1. Only I understand.
  2. Only Alice is happy.
  3. I only eat apples.
Answers
  1. mi po'o jimpe
  2. la .alis. po'o gleki
  3. mi citka lo plise po'o

items.text: I want to go. However, I must stay.
items.answer: `mi djica lo nu klama .i ku'i mi bilga lo nu stali`

items.text: I like it. However, I don't need it.
items.answer: `mi nelci ri .i ku'i mi na nitcu ri`

sections.content:
Conversation Challenge (1-2 min)

Say aloud:

  1. "I go. However, you stay." → mi klama .i ku'i do stali
  2. "I also like it." → mi ji'a nelci ri
  3. "Only I work." → mi po'o gunka

Summary

You learned three discursives: ku'i (however), ji'a (also), po'o (only). They comment on your speech.

Tomorrow preview: More discursives — mu'a, ta'o, to'u.
